ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act
PrecisRegulations amending the COMPREHENSIVE STUDY LIST REGULATIONS to more clearly define the types of projects that will be subject to a comprehensive study in all the offshore regions of Canada where oil and gas activities are permitted, effective July 28, 2003.
